Articles.Content: Hi i am new on this forum. And i bought ksp 4 months ago And my name is Lime. and i like to build Rockets!

Hello welcome to the forums. You will find exciting opportunities to show off all your rockets in the spacecraft exchange. Have fun! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hello Lime, and welcome to the forums!

You have come to a good place. Especially if you like to build rockets! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Everybody around here is getting pretty worked up because version 1.0 is just days from release. So excuse us if we seem a bit distracted at the moment.

Happy landings!
Welcome aboard! Don't be afraid to share your rockets with all of us. We like to see new explosions. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
